website_summaries.verdict: A great costume for younger children from a familiar TV show.
pros: 3-piece combination costume is easy to put on and take off
Designed to fit a wide variety of sizes in the younger child range (3 to 4 years)
cons: Build quality of the costume is less than ideal
Velcro can come loose at times

customer_reviews.title: I bought a Small costume for my 3 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Small costume for my 3 year old who was 39 inches 5 months ago and is probably at least 41 inches now. The description said age 3-4, but Small is actually 4-6. Definitely way too big on him, but he loves it and I rolled up the legs and arms. Not sure if the smaller size would have fit him anyway since it goes to 39 inches and this one starts at 44 inches. So darling, but I just wish he didn't fall right in between sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Christie S. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Toddler size fits like a roomy 3t. Hats a spec to small. Very thin. But adorable! and affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: The toddler costume fits like 3t, and its roomy enough to fit warm clothes underneath. Problems:1. its toddler size so there should be easy diaper/potty access, no? 2. The hats a spec to small for average toddler heads, but still looks cute. 3. The fabric (esspecially the red vest) is ridiculously thin, but that was expected. My son loves it tho, and thats all that matters, thanks for making him happy for such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Poor describtion on sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I followed everyones review on sizing. Seemed they were saying a small fit 3-4 year olds. And when I clicked on toddler it said 1-2. My options were toddler (1-2), small, or medium. DO NOT GET SMALL FOR 3-4. I guess if you are looking for that age you are SOL. Small is for 5 to 6. Way too big for my 3 year old. Medium for 6 to 7. Toddler... I don't know what it fits. I can't send it back now since my son tried it on and won't take it off. I am going to hem it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Andrea Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great costume for my son! He is 37" tall and weighs about 28lbs. I got the toddler size and it fit him perfectly. He tried it on and didn't take it off for about 2 hours! He was even making us call him Marshall the whole time he had it on! I am very happy with the quality of the costume. Overall this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute and machine washable
customer_reviews.text: My sons both love this so much I had to buy a second so each could have one. Even though it isn't halloween, they love to wear it just for fun. The colors are vibrant and the fit is pretty good. After about 20 washes the tags started to come off, but that is really good in my opinion. Most costumes arent' actually made to be washed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Zane

customer_reviews.title: Runs small order up for tall kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 3T/4T. Costumes are completely ADORABLE. They look great but let me give you some specifics. The material is very thin. Very thin felt. The badges are made out if foam so it can easily be ripped off. The costume does come with a tail, hat and very thin backpack. The backpack straps are velcro at the bottom. Again, very thin material so you’ll have to put some newspapers or something for the backpack to puff up. My boys love it though. I ordered the 3t/4t and it was too short for them. If you child is tall order up. Very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: 🧡 Mollyngil 🧡

customer_reviews.title: Great for dress up too
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a huge hit for my Paw Patrol obsessed kiddo. The material was lightweight but warm enough for a slightly chilly evening of trick or treating. It had a cute little puppy tail and bonus... includes a small backpack! It seems like a lot of times, these type of costumes are almost one time use, but this has held up really well. My son still wears the costume for dress-up play and wears the hat as part of his regular wardrobe lol. I usually loath spending money on a Halloween costume, but this one has been well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Maesie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great costume. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Paw Patrol play that was in town. It arrived in time and my daughter was thrilled. She loved the fact that it had a little tail that she could wag. This was great for the purpose that I needed it for. The only downside is that when she tried to pull the costume off herself she pulled it by the paw tag in the front and it tore right off. Other than that I think this is a great purchase for your little one and it’s sure to make them stand out as the Paw Patrol pup, Marshall.
customer_reviews.author: Shango

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it... He wore it for 24hrs.. We took it off of him during his nap... (The struggle) Lol! But washing it was awful.. It was a one time use.. So Halloween was it.. No dress up for fun afterwards
customer_reviews.author: shanel h., REALTOR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's not that thick, but it's big enough to layer things under it if you need to. The backpack is a bit big (the straps are a bit long) and theres no way to adjust them. (But we'll make it work). The hat is perfect! I bought this for my soon to be 3 year old for Halloween. Bought a 4-6 year for him, so I expected it to be a bit big. My son has already tried it on and LOVES it and he look so cute in it. Its definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s so cute. I bought the toddler size for my 1 year old who wears a 2t-3t and it fits just perfect with enough room to wear clothes underneath. As far as thickness it’s pretty thin. Also the back pack is so cute and can be used as a trick or treat bag for a small amount of candy, if it gets too heavy it may be unable to ware due to the Velcro not sticking.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBerman

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a halloween costume. It fits perfect and is super cute. I was hesitant when I first opened it because it honestly looks pretty cheap. It is all one piece and I wasn't expecting that. But it looks good, and It will probably only be worn a few times. I was disappointed that the backpack wasn't more adjustable, and that the velcro will snag the material if it touches it. I had to cross the straps to make it not fall off. Overall it was a good deal for a costume.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Cheaply Made and Small Hat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved this costume! She wants to wear it all the time! It fit her very well! My biggest complaints are that the hat was small and therefore kept falling off with the slightest breeze. We ended up taking it off and not wearing it for the majority of Halloween. Also, the material is very thin and cheaply made. I don't think this costume could be washed and worn a second time as it may start to fall apart. I saw some other reviews that said it looked more like a cow than a dog, but I think the picture represents the actual costume very well. The spots are wear the image suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Nichols

customer_reviews.title: love love love this...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is adorable. My son is 2, I bought him a small and its kind of big on him but I just folded the pant legs up and he looks great! The hat has dog ears sewn on it. The backpack is separate and opens up and they can put toys or candy in it. The costume itself is thin felt like material. My son looks so cute in this I can't stand it...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Happiest child EVER
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids came to visit. Granddaughter always has plenty of "dress-up" clothes but little man ......not so much. As soon as I showed him the package he started stripping off his clothes! (he is 4) Once he got this on, he would not take it off. Wore it all day, slept in it, wore it all the next day.......best money I've spent in a while. SO CUTE.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute good quality kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I originally ordered the 2T-3T but it was a little snug for my 3 year old so I ordered the next size up. It’s a little big but works great and will allow room for clothing underneath for Halloween. He was sooo excited to get his costume! It’s fairly soft but to much right play I feel it may rip easy. But great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fits well (Small 4-6)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 5 year old grandson to wear to school for the favorite book character parade and it is adorable. I ordered a Small (4 to 6 years) and it fits almost perfect. I may hem it a turn. He normally wears a 5T and this fits like a 5-6 boys. He loves the "power pack" back pack.
customer_reviews.author: realReviewer

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. My son wanted to dress up like Marshall. The hat is flimsy, but I figured it would be, as it is made of fabric. I ordered a size up because you never really know with costumes. It was pretty long in the arms and legs, but easy to hem if you've got those skills.
customer_reviews.author: Mel G

customer_reviews.title: Choose your size wisely!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and got the size small for my 2 1/2 year old since he’s big for his age. Glad I did. It’s a little long but otherwise the fit is good. There’s no way the toddler size would’ve fit. My only issue with it is the backpack straps are held on by Velcro and barely hold so don’t plan on using the backpack to hold Halloween candy because it can’t handle the weight. Good purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Cut, but needed fine tuning!
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume, I just wish that the sizes were more specific. my son is 4 so I bought the small thinking over clothes, but it is long in the arms and legs, he is an average 4, and wears a size 3-4 clothes, It will work, but I would have went with the toddler one. also wish the hat brim had wire or something in it to keep its shape, it just flaps over his eyes
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It fits her good with a little room to go
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for my 4.5 year old daughter. She is 43 inches and 35 pounds. She is tall and skinny. It fits her good with a little room to go. I think the quality of the costume is great! I got it for her to use as a pretend play costume so I don't plan on washing it unless it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: Marshall Paw Patrol Costume Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Cute and well made costume. But it runs very small. The 2T-3T is a very small 2T, almost 18 month size. The helmet is too small. Pup tag works well... My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Tail

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly cute.  Would definitely recommend if your kids love Paw Patrol
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is such a cute halloween costume. And perfect for toddlers who don't like to wear anything too bulky. I was surprised that my 18-month old actually wore the hat while trick-or-treating! The hat comes with attached dog ears. His older brother was a fireman, so he needed his fire dog to go with him. He got compliments all night on how cute he looked.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Halloween costume. We got LOTS of compliments on it. It was actually cuter than I thought it would be. I wish I had checked over it better when I got it, some of the stitching wasn't right, but I didn't realize until after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The cutest! Great price and impressed with the quality. It was a little big on my 3yo but he wore it over sweatpants and a long sleeve shirt so I could roll it under and it looked perfect. Plus he can grow into it and get more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Halloween, but my son uses it to this day! He was in between sizes of 18 months and 2t. Best purchase ever he loves it!! The only thing is that he broke off the fire tag because he thought it was a front zipper, but I sewed it back on. No issues there.
customer_reviews.author: CiGutz

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and a half year old loves the Paw Patrol, especially Marshall, so this costume is perfect for him. He is about average size and I got the 3T and fits just fine. The hat is a nice touch and not too annoying for kids to wear, even my LO keeps it on!
customer_reviews.author: Fritz23

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, it fits my four year old, the legs and arms are a bit too long but can be folded. Very easy to put on and off, has velcro on the back to close the costume. Came with the hat and backpack. The badge is a bit flimsy, it fell off on the fourth day, it's was an easy fix but just know that the badge can easily be torn off the costume.
customer_reviews.author: coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good costume
customer_reviews.text: Good costume for the price. The only issue I had was the hat. My son really wasn't interested in wearing it but it also seemed a little small for him. But I think the quality is good for the time spent wearing it on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved how costume & didn't want to take it off. The costume was made decently well & had no issues. The fit was a little large on my 3 yr old but he didn't mind one bit overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PorscheNikki

customer_reviews.title: My child loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and my baby puts the costume over his pajamas a month and a half after Halloween! It keeps him warm and happy. I love the smile on his face as he asks to wear it almost on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome costume! Looks great, my son is 3 yrs old and 38” tall... the toddler size fit perfect. The material is really thin but the cost reflects that, I would pay more for better fabric. Everybody loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Love! But buy a real fireman hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love! My son was sooo cute in this costume. But I didn’t really like the foam hat so I used a real plastic fireman hat, cut off the ears to the costume hat and hot glued them on the inside of the plastic fireman hat! Looked way better!
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Von Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is just too cute. Super fast shipping also. My son was so excited to try it on as soon as it arrived. Fits him perfectly. He is thin and wears a 3t, the toddler sized costume fits perfect. I am adding a thin elastic to the hat to go under his chin so it will not blow off while trick or treating.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I order size 4-6 for my very thin 3 year old grandson who normally wears 3t-4t. It fits in the shoulders but the legs and arms are long enough for a 4 or 5 year old. The hat and backpack are cute.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Luckhurst

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My son was so excited to get this in the mail. He opened the box and just started going nuts he was so excited. He's 3years old, on Halloween he will be 4. So just a few weeks shy of 4 years old. It fits him perfectly. There's also enough room for a hoodie and extra pair of pants for if it's cold out.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: easy to wipe off
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Appears brand new but has dirt on it, easy to wipe off. My son is 4, usually wears a 3t. The legs are long in this and it's roomy but fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 3 1/2, fairly tall but very lean wore this costume 3 times for Halloween. It held up great. It was a little wide on him, but I was anticipating that with him being so skinny. He's in majority 4T stuff and this fit well, but a smidge big. But we were okay with that since he had a layer on under. We are in the Midwest, so Halloween is usually chilly! I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey A Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL COSTUME!
customer_reviews.text: My three and a half year old daughter saw this costume on one of the shows she watches on youtube and was just obsessed with it and had to have it... she hasn't taken it off in 2 days! she absolutely loves it! it fits her great and she is 40 inches tall. There is definitely a few inches of room to grow. She loves putting things in the backpack and the floppy ears on the hat. Definitely worth the $20 (even though I have never spent that much on a costume before!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lesley A. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Fit very good to my 3 1/2 years old Just the strap on the backpack they use velcro which didn’t work for us because we use it to hold the candys but it didn’t stay on his arms
customer_reviews.author: Carlos and Roxana  funes

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for kids play!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this for Halloween and continues to use it for dress up play. He’s 4 years old and does not worry about playing too rough in it. It’s lasted 6 months so far with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jchen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4. He is small for his age so I had to hem his quite a bit. He loved it and it was worth fixing. The sizing chart they give you could be explained better but I am not disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Blake

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old can't wait for Halloween. He loves the costume, it seems very comfortable and warm enough for a chilly night. He loves that it comes with a backpack to collect his candy in.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great costume with minor tweaks
customer_reviews.text: The Marshall costume was great. The legs were a little long but that was an easy fix and the hat works great. My son LOVES to wear it around the house. The tag did fall off the first day, but washing wise nothing smeared. After about 5 washes the spots on the arms start to fade. But costume was a good price and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Engrav

customer_reviews.title: Huge costume but tiny hat which does not fit
customer_reviews.text: The costume is huge (we we expected since it covers several years on the sizing notes) but the hat is tiny, doesn't fit my 3 year olds head?! Very strange, and the hat makes the whole costume so it's a bummer. We just added an elastic strap for now but won't be able to use it again next year like we hoped. Otherwise the costume is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: akaMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and in tact. Got the right size too so it fit perfectly on my little brother. I recommend buying it but after we received it my mom saw the exact same costume at Target so just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: The costume is perfect for a kid who only wants it for Halloween- for a kid that likes to play costumes regularly, it’s not super durable. Great purchase overall though!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this costume for my daughter for Halloween. The quality is better than I expected for the cost. I will say that if its chilly out you will definitely want to layer clothes. Other than that she loves it and barely takes it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Great, except the dog tag.
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described with the exception of the tag. My son had it pulled off within minutes of trying on the costume. The tag is simple foam paper that you'd use for a child's art project. Everything was great, except the dog tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We love it! arf! arf!
customer_reviews.text: my son and I LOVE the costume!! I didn't give it a 5 star though coz the quality looks like it's gonna break after 2-3 washes.. haha! though for the price ($10+), I guess it's worth it already if my son would be able to use it in 1-2 occasions.. my son is only 3yo, but weighs abt 20KG and the fit is just nice for him... the small back pack that came with the outfit is perfect for him to use for trick or treating..:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pawfect ....❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume ... washed it and it still looks great... actually bought two... one for my grandson to wear daily and one to save for next year... ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure on sizing going off previous reviews. My son usually wears a 3t so we got the toddler size (2-4) and it fits perfectly. I can’t wait to take him out for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old loved it! Super cute! He ripped the ”tag” off the ”collar” because he said it was itchy. Slightly restrictive around the neck. Not enough to harm at all. Still giving 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Cheney

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I knew what to expect from this kind of costume. It's thin and and not really fitted, but it'll do for a Halloween costume that's going to be worn once (or maybe a few times here and there if he wants to play with it). I really don't care for the hat, it's flimsy and doesn't really hold its shape so I went ahead and ordered a real fire fighter hat (hard plastic) and will just put the ears and paw patrol logo on it for Halloween. Other than that, it's not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Parra

customer_reviews.title: Best marshal costume I found.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore this for Halloween. She's a 4t and this fit perfect and looks like it'll fit next year as well. I love that she could use the back pack to put candy in. My only complaint is the hat was small and looked awkward.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: ... is probably small for his age so it was pretty big on him
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 1/2 year old son who is probably small for his age so it was pretty big on him. However, my main complaint is that the fat fits horribly and I can imagine it fitting any human head right.. I thought it might just be small for his head but then I tried it on my 1 year old's head and it still wasn't right.. I think the stitching is just weird on the inside or something. The rest of the costume is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pecora

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: Some seemed to have issue with quality but I think for the price this was a great costume. My son loved it so much he wore it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Willis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit around the waist, but arms and legs were long. I wish the hat was bigger or stretchy to stay on better. My son absolutely loves it though!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend's son as they couldn't find his size in local stores. It was a little more expensive but he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Randolph

customer_reviews.title: My three year old loved it and got many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a big hit!! My three year old loved it and got many compliments!!! I was very pleased for the price and arrival time!
customer_reviews.author: blaine hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol Marshall Costume
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume with backpack and hat. A few inches long for my grandson, I will need to hem it before Halloween. Other than the longer length, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great Halloween costume. Ran a little big on my son who is a tall 4-year old, but was great for its purpose and the cost.
customer_reviews.author: kjwill

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Marshall ! He’s 3 and a big boy. He weighs 40 lbs i ordered a 4/6
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Marshall
customer_reviews.text: Fit well the only con is the backpack straps should be sewn on instead of velcro because they come off & it couldn't be used for candy holding
customer_reviews.author: terri clark

customer_reviews.title: although I feel like he does have a larger head for his age
customer_reviews.text: The hat is small compared to the costume and does not fit right for my almost 4 year old, although I feel like he does have a larger head for his age. But the costume is plenty big so the hat just doesn’t seem to coordinate with body of the costume. Otherwise it’s a great costume for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: Poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: Material is very thin. My son wears a 3t/4t, so I bought him the small (3-4). It fits perfectly in the torso, but the legs are super long (at least 6 inches too long) and the hat barely fits his head. So sizing is a little funky on this.
customer_reviews.author: JENN B

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: He looked adorable, but said it was itchy and after about an hr of him wearing it the Velcro on the back started falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor-Drew

customer_reviews.title: Cute! My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 years old and he wears a xs or small in little boy. This costume fits perfectly on him. It's just a little itchy for him bc he has a little sensory problem. But other than that, I'll just put clothes underneath the costume it self so it doesn't bother him while we go trick or treating.
customer_reviews.author: JLdp

customer_reviews.title: Fun Costume.
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old loved this. It was a little long, but I didn't mind that. The only downside to this costume for me was the hat. It is very small, and my child has a “normal” sized head. I wish they would make it either adjustable somehow or just a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Sixlazy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Fit great except hat ran a little small.
customer_reviews.text: This was the cutest costume on my 19 month old. Everything fit perfectly except the hat was a bit small. So he wouldnt keep it on. Other than that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great costume quality
customer_reviews.text: This costume has gone in the wash multiple times and continues to get played with. Definitely a great buy, and it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: ErikaV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler costume
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My 2 and a half year old loves this costume. You can put things in the backpack too. He likes the tail and doesn't mind wearing the hat. It was reasonably priced. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Soto

customer_reviews.title: Cute but way too long
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume but it was wayyyyy too big for my 3 1/2 year old who is average size. I'm going to have to take up the bottom because there is a good 8 inches that is hanging down. But otherwise very cute and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: K Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Fit my toddler perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any other reviews in the toddler size so I hope this helps anyone else who's considering this for a smaller child. My son will be 3 the day before Halloween and this fits him perfectly. He's average size and he adores his costume. He may wear it out before Halloween comes.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume
customer_reviews.text: I loved that you could dress appropriately for the weather under the costume. My child loved this costume and still wears it whenever the mood strikes. Worth the investment for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy M. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: And - who had the great idea to put velcro attachments on the backpack straps ...
customer_reviews.text: Such cheap material! Pilling before we even got out the door. And - who had the great idea to put velcro attachments on the backpack straps that of course come off when the child tries to put it on and then stick all over the costume instead - messing it up! =(
customer_reviews.author: Natalia C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price value
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size small (4-6) for my toddler (he's bigger than average 2 yr old) and it ended up being too long but I just folded the hem. Fast shipping and value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom3

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Really cute my son loved it. The little back kept coming off due to running from trick or treating
customer_reviews.author: Alice chatman

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a little big since it's cold for Halloween. He was able to fit warm clothes underneath. Super cute here got so many compliments! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn G

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. My baby still wants to wear it and were coming up on Christmas. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Fits my two year old perfectly! Back pack is a little big but he doesn’t like to keep back packs on anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Kori Borns

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume. Timely shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume. Identical to the ones found in chain stores. But much reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: satregu1

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and my son loves it but I do feel its priced a little high
customer_reviews.author: Draya

customer_reviews.title: For boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: My niece wore this got Halloween. Made her the happiest for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Loeyd

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great but...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this had stains on it straight out of the package. I pay for Prime to get 2 day shipping and this took longer than 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Bad Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for my nephew, but it was too big for him (that was my fault, I couldn’t find his size). He still looked super cute! The quality was good just like any costume you’d buy at PartyCity. It wasn’t comfy for him because it was too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed this outfit. It survived a party at school as well as a freezing-cold Trick or Treating walk.
customer_reviews.author: Bret and Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints about this cute and well-priced costume! My girls have so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Theadora

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Fit great, held up well for pictures and trick or treating, and is now in the dress up box.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Potts

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fit my soon to be 4 year old great. The pack back is cheaply made its supposed to be use for trick or treating bit I couldn't see it holding a lot of candy
customer_reviews.author: Kearra C

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Got this my 2 year old and he loved it! The hat was soft, so he was more willing to wear it instead of a plastic helmet. He also loved that he had his own "pup pack" and. Ould put his candy in it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. It was easy to put on top of his clothes.. we used it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Daffodil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. My son refused to take it off! Love the tail that’s on it too
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old. He absolutely loves it. The two reasons I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's cheaply made and also runs on the bigger side. I ended up doing a little work on this one, turning it into a two piece and making it more fitting for my son. Worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy N.

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Fit our little guy great. Easy to drop when potty time strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe V.

customer_reviews.title: The head peace was AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVED this costume!!!!! Almost perfect, I had to adjust the backpack straps (with a needle and thread) to make it a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume for all you Paw Patrol lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable! My little girl loved it. We added a red tutu and she wore it proudly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for costume that was not too warm. This is perfect. Quality better than expected and true to size
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The size small fits my tall 4 year old a tad big but it fits. The quality is really good for the price. All the details are here. The hat, the backpack, the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, hand wash only (which is a pain) Backpack has help straps. Hat was bent up, would have needed to iron. Very thin material. Did it's job on looking like Marshall. Wouldn't buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie  Leigh

product_meta.title: Rubie's Paw Patrol Marshall Child Costume, Small
product_meta.description: Size:Small/4-6 YearsYour little will be all fired up and ready for a ruff-ruff rescue in this adorable officially licensed Marshall costume! Dalmatian printed long sleeve jumpsuit with attached red printed top; red firefighter hat with attached ears; red pup pack backpack with shoulder straps finishes this complete costume! Includes jumpsuit, hat and pup pack; shoes sold separately. Every pup on Paw Patrol brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. Rubie's Costume Company has been bringing costumes and accessories to the world since 1950. As the world's leader, we take our mission seriously to make dressing up fun! Mascots, rental quality costumes, masks, wigs, accessories, shoes, and every significant licensed costume you want to wear can be found under the Rubie's brand. Still family owned and still family focused, Rubie's brings you fun for every season: Halloween, Christmas, Mardi Gras, Easter, and every occasion in-between.
feature_bullets: Officially licensed PAW PATROL MARSHALL jumpsuit, hat and pup pack
Long sleeve BLACK AND WHITE DALMATION PRINTED JUMPSUIT with attached red printed top; printed fire hat with attached ears, and red pup pack
READ BEFORE BUYING: Costumes are not sized the same as apparel, use Rubie's Children's size chart, reviews and Q & A for best fit, do not choose based on age or clothing size
Coordinate with other officially licensed PAW PATROL costumes and accessories from Rubie's in styles and sizes for the whole family
Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. since 1950, Rubie’s has classic and licensed costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for your entire family

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
